promotions.text: The Latest Exclusive Funkos are Always at FYE!

fye.000000889698260909.title: Funko Pop! Rocks: Kurt Cobain (Exclusive)
fye.000000889698260909.description: Make some room on that shelf for the iconic front man of Nirvana! This exclusive Funko Pop! features Kurt Cobain with acoustic guitar in his tan sweater, just like when he performed on MTV Unplugged in 1994! You can get the album from us, too!

aec.ci584075.2.title: CNCO - CNCO (Deluxe)
aec.ci584075.2.description: Your favorite Latin boy band is back with this self-titled album!

aec.hwdd002503702.2.title: Breaking Benjamin - Ember
aec.hwdd002503702.2.description: On the second outing with a revamped lineup, hard rock outfit Breaking Benjamin stick to their tried and true formula, continuing the legacy of early-2000s post-grunge/nu-metal with album number six, Ember. [...] As far as variety goes, this is a fairly standard collection of tunes from a band that is mainly concerned with giving fans what they want and expect. ~Neil Z. Yeung

rovi.MR0004871403.title: Lil Xan - Total Xanarchy
rovi.MR0004871403.description: "We really wanted the album to be something else. This album is where I feel like I shine with the whole creativity. It's a lot of stuff people haven't heard. It's a very mature sound. I don't think they're going to expect it." ~Lil Xan, from Ebro in the Morning show

aec.bbgt1463a.2.title: BTS - Love Yourself: Her
aec.bbgt1463a.2.description: In 2017, BTS won the Top Social Artist Award at the Billboard Music Awards, solidifying their presence in the U.S. and confirming their influence on the charts. Their fifth EP, Love Yourself 'Her', arrived months later and set a record as the first K-pop album to debut in the Billboard 200's Top Ten, entering the chart at number seven. The effort featured the single "DNA," which also became the group's first song to hit the Hot 100. ~ Neil Z. Yeung

aec.cnmi8073828.2.title: Judas Priest - Firepower
aec.cnmi8073828.2.description: Closing in on their 50th anniversary, Judas Priest still possess the musical rigor, showmanship, and force that make other bands bow down. FIREPOWER smokes. ~ Thom Jurek

fye.000000047323703058.title: SoundAura Matte Bluetooth Headphone
fye.000000047323703058.description: These exclusive bluetooth headphones from SoundAura come in 5 different colors - Black, Purple, Blue, Red, and Mint! Check them out in stores or online!

fye.000000047323702754.title: iLive IAEB07 Bluetooth Earbuds
fye.000000047323702754.description: These neat bluetooth headphones from iLive come in 4 different colors - Black, Blue, Purple, and White! Check them out in stores or online!

fye.000000047532910124.title: iHome Light-up Portable Bluetooth Speaker
fye.000000047532910124.description: Bring the party wherever you go with the iBT85 Bluetooth speaker with speakerphone. Stream music wirelessly from your Bluetooth-enabled device. Enjoy your music without missing a call. Aux-in jack to play audio from any device equipped with a headphone jack. Two stereo drivers for rich, detailed sound. Color changing mode for fun, fabulous color effects which can be controlled via free app. Operates on internal rechargeable battery, charges via included USB charging cable. USB port to charge mobile devices. iPX4- rated water and splash resistant. Works with free Melody voice powered music assistant app to play music from iHeartRadio, Spotify and more.

fye.000000889698279949.title: Funko Pop!: Avengers Infinity War Unmasked Iron Man
fye.000000889698279949.description: How much did you enjoy Infinity War? Get this Iron Man Funko Pop! for your Marvel collection. Only available from FYE!

fye.000000889698269865.title: Funko Pop! Star Wars: Solo: Dryden Vos
fye.000000889698269865.description: Get this Dryden Vos Funko Pop! to complete your Star Wars collection. Only available from FYE!

aec.fox2332786dvd.title: The Greatest Showman
aec.fox2332786dvd.description: This musical about the life of entrepreneur P.T. Barnum (Hugh Jackman) depicts how he found fame and fortune by starting a circus in 1870s America. The Greatest Showman posits Barnum as the creator of modern show business, and a man who believed in celebrating those who were different instead of scorning them. Zac Efron, Michelle Williams, Zendaya, and Rebecca Ferguson co-star. Directed by Michael Gracey. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

aec.prt59172274000dvd.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: The Complete Series
aec.prt59172274000dvd.description: Binge on this fan-favorite Nickelodeon animated series! Follow Aang's journey to fulfill his destiny in the world full of elemental magic!

aec.wd14767000br.title: Coco
aec.wd14767000br.description: A 12-year-old boy named Miguel (voice of Anthony Gonzalez) dreams of becoming a famous guitar player, despite the misgivings of his close-knit family. When his ambitions cause him to run afoul of a terrible curse, he must journey into the Land of the Dead in order to seek forgiveness from his deceased ancestors. Gael Garcia Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach, Alfonso Arau, Herbert Siguenza, Gabriel Iglesias, Natalia Cordova-Buckley, and Edward James Olmos also lend their voices to this animated adventure, which was directed by Lee Unkrich and co-directed by Adrian Molina. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

aec.whv1000634426br.title: Justice League
aec.whv1000634426br.description: In the wake of Superman's death, Batman (Ben Affleck) and Wonder Woman (Gal Gadot) recruit superpowered individuals to defend humanity from an otherworldly threat called Steppenwolf (Ciar√°n Hinds). Together with their new allies -- Cyborg (Ray Fisher), Aquaman (Jason Momoa), and the Flash (Ezra Miller) -- they form the superhero team known as the Justice League. Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Jeremy Irons, Diane Lane, Connie Nielsen, Amber Heard, Joe Morton, and J.K. Simmons co-star. Directed by Zack Snyder. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

fye.000000793396555550.title: Five Nights at Freddy's Nightmare Puffs Cereal
fye.000000793396555550.description: Freddy Fazbear approves this cereal!üêªüêªüêª Pick up your box of #FiveNightsAtFreddys ‚ÄòNightmare Puffs‚Äô exclusively at FYE!

fye.000000732577741665.title: Rick and Morty Exclusive Strawberry Smiggles Cereal
fye.000000732577741665.description: Freddy Fazbear approves this cereal!üêªüêªüêª Pick up your box of #FiveNightsAtFreddys ‚ÄòNightmare Puffs‚Äô exclusively at FYE!

aec.fuko7487.title: Funko Pop!: Deadpool Thumb Up
aec.fuko7487.description: From the Marvel Universe, one and only Deadpool! Thumbs up to you for considering this Funko Pop! for your collection.

aec.fuko14813.title: Funko Pop!: Bob Ross
aec.fuko14813.description: From the joy of painting, Bob Ross, as a stylized pop vinyl from Funko! Figure stands 3 3/4 inches and comes in a window display box. Check out the other television figures from Funko! #collect them all!

fye.000000789185564155.title: Funko Pop!: Dr. Emmett Brown - Loot Crate Exclusive
fye.000000789185564155.description: Go back in time with Back to the Future Funko Pop! This adorable Pop! features Dr. Brown with his jump cables and goggles!

aec.nplm11616.2.title: Kamelot - The Shadow Theory
aec.nplm11616.2.description: Your favorite symphonic metal band is back with its twelfth studio album, The Shadow Theory! Kamelot invites you to the fantastical world with this album full of orchestral and operatic tracks. Get your copy now!

aec.atl565429.2.title: Nipsey Hussle - Victory Lap
aec.atl565429.2.description: After years of buildup, South Central rapper Nipsey Hussle issued his major-label debut, Victory Lap. Featuring a throwback G-funk sound improved by modern production, the set was produced by Nipsey, his brother Samiel Asghedom, "Steve-O" Carless, Mike & Keys, Murda Beatz, and more. Growing an audience over years of independent grassroots self-promotion, Nipsey's first official full-length is a triumph for the artist, recruiting an impressive roster of guests without sacrificing his uncompromising street realness. [...] Victory Lap is not just a celebration from the scrappy MC: it's a deserved moment marking his journey from Crenshaw to the majors. ~ Neil Z. Yeung

trev.nbc114.at.0.title: The Office - Dunder Mifflin Short Sleeve T-Shirt
trev.nbc114.at.0.description: Show your Dunder Mifflin pride with this simple & clean t-shirt! Must-have for the fans of The Office series and Scranton branch of the company. Comes in charcoal and navy!

fye.000000191685175142.title: The Avengers Infinity T-shirt
fye.000000191685175142.description: Enjoyed the new Avengers movie? Or are you yet to get to the theaters? Either way, geek out in this exclusive t-shirt that features all your favorite Marvel Universe characters!

fye.000000665398255007.title: Black Panther The Protector of Wakanda T-shirt
fye.000000665398255007.description: You will discover mind-blowing Ambigram lettering on each and every Red Chapter t-shirt. We've collaborated closely with Marvel to create a one-of-a-kind Premium collection that pairs Mark Palmer's world-famous Ambigram lettering with Marvel's iconic Super Heroes. We strive everyday to engineer clothing that we love to wear, and we are proud to share our passion with you. Red Chapter's Red Label Collection is designed and printed in America.

aec.bgrt34725.2.title: A Perfect Circle - Eat the Elephant
aec.bgrt34725.2.description: Everyone is saying it's different but still great! Check out the latest album from the super, if not legendary, alt rock group who has returned after 14 years!

aec.fuko12441.title: Funko Pop! Animation: Rick & Morty Mr. Meeseeks
aec.fuko12441.description: What's your biggest wish? Just say them out loud to this Mr. Meeseeks Funko Pop!, and he just might make it come true! Even more adorable than shown in the show, it's a must-have for Rick and Morty fan & Funko Pop! collectors alike.

aec.wd14899900dvd.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
aec.wd14899900dvd.description: Rian Johnson (Looper, Brick) wrote and directed this installment of the Star Wars saga, which picks up where The Force Awakens left off. Rey (Daisy Ridley) learns the ways of the Force from Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill), and develops a telepathic bond with Kylo Ren (Adam Driver), who is struggling to master the Dark Side. Meanwhile, Stormtrooper-turned-Resistance fighter Finn (John Boyega) teams up with pilot Poe Dameron (Oscar Isaac) and maintenance worker Rose Tico (Kelly Marie Tran) for a risky mission behind enemy lines. Carrie Fisher, Domhnall Gleeson, Benicio Del Toro, Gwendoline Christie, and Laura Dern co-star. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

aec.fuko28671.title: Funko Pop! Rides: Game Of Thrones Night King On Dragon
aec.fuko28671.description: How much did you like all those twists in the seventh season of Game of Thrones? If your answer is yes, then head to the Funko section to check out this majestic Funko Pop! from the Rides collection. A must-have item for Funko Pop! or Game of Thrones fan!

aec.hbo1000697748dvd.title: Game of Thrones: Seasons 1-7
aec.hbo1000697748dvd.description: Are you still suffering from the latest season of Game of Thrones? Or can't wait for 2018 to be over for Season 8 to come out? Us, too! Let's keep calm and do another marathon...
